refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Update a container base image. This achieves the same thing as running apt update && apt full-upgrade on the base image and making the changes permanent. Additionally, &command; will prune all caches and ensure all required packages and scripts are installed in the container image.
Running &command; on the images that are in use about once a week ensures builds will happen faster, due to less changes that have to be done prior to each build.
